page.title: 13 CLOTHES CHILDREN WEAR
page.content: I like to wear skirts and blouses because you can wear them in a variety of ways,unlike dresses. {In the winter} we wear duffle coats, scarves,wooly hats,gloves and wellington boots.{In the summer} we wear shorts and T-shirts,cotton dresses, swimming costumes or bikinis. Young people today wear clothes which never spoil their fun.Girls can be as active as boys now T-shirts and jeans can be worn by anyone. Our Primary school does not have a {school uniform} but our secondary school does.The uniform for boys and girls is quite similar and includes a tie in the school colours.
